pull.title: Check for compatibility with download in FindNextBlocksToDownload
pull.body:
Fixes #8518 (untested).

Move the witness-compatibility of a peer with downloading to FindNextBlocksToDownload. This should be more efficient than doing it afterwards in SendMessages, and avoids accidentally marking peers as stalling.

cc @MarcoFalke @sdaftuar

events.message: Check for compatibility with download in FindNextBlocksToDownload
